org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.languages.java.reverse.ui.dnd

Interface IJobAndTransactionForDrop

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJobAndTransactionForDrop, ReverseJobAndTransactionForDrop

    public interface IJobAndTransactionForDrop
    This interface provides the methods used in the life cycle of a drop strategy with Job and Transaction. The methods are called in the following order :
    • init(Request, EditPart)
    • canExecute()
    • jobPreprocess(IProgressMonitor)
    • #jobRun()
    • jobPostProcess()
    This lifecycle is controlled by the AbstractJobAndTransactionalDropStrategy class. The controler will create appropriate Job and transactional command, and call corresponding methods when required.
    Author:
    cedric dumoulin
